scripts.start:local: npm run setup:local && npm run debug && http-server -S -C cert.pem -p 8000 -c-1 ./build/demo &
scripts.start:test: npm run setup:test && npm run debug
scripts.start:dev: npm run setup:dev && npm run build
scripts.start:int: npm run setup:int && npm run build
scripts.start:stg: npm run setup:stg && npm run build
scripts.start:prd: npm run setup:prd && npm run build
scripts.start:fkr1: npm run setup:fkr1 && npm run build
scripts.start:fkr2: npm run setup:fkr2 && npm run build
scripts.start:dist: npm run setup:prd && npm run dist
